title: Strategy of Elimination
text: To eliminate variables, add the second equation from the first equation to remove the $$y^2$$ term.

title: Resulting Expression
text: What is the resulting expression only in terms of $$x$$ when the first and second equations are added?

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: To solve for the x-coordinates of the two possible solutions, divide both sides by $$8$$ and take the square root. Note both the positive and negative answers.

title: Solve for $$y$$
text: To solve for y-coordinates, plug in both x-values to either the first or second equation and isolate the $$y$$.
